document_data.name: Dacha of the Fish
document_data.mainbody: The '''Dacha of the Fish''' was an establishment located in [[Almorel]] on the [[Lake of Mists]] in the [[Hordelands]] in the {{YearlinkName|1357}}.{{Cite interactive atlas}}
document_data.Activities: The building was located in northeastern Almorel behind the [[Gospoda]]. It was responsible for taking care of the widows of fishermen.
